lender.name: Julia

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: I wish to encourage others to reach for the stars and keep on, keeping on to achieve their goals

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small family run publishing company, so I know all about being a start-up and how challenging it can be. I also know how freeing it is to be your own boss. To give this opportunity to others, is one of the greatest gifts you can give.

lender.name: Benjamin & Meredith Levy
lender.loan_because: We know how much of a difference two people can make in the lives of others!
lender.occupational_info: Benjamin is a high school teacher, and Meredith is working for a non-profit organization focused on education.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Fifth grade student.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I feel that other parts of the world need help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 6th grader.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a break
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company, so I am one of many. We are on a team to put up web pages so that customers can buy our products.

lender.name: Chua Family
lender.loan_because: We are abundantly blessed.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because:
this is a great way to help people who are beyond needing simple handouts, and to enable the receiver to better their lives, and often their community's life.
Further I think KIVA is a better alternative to the large financial corporations ever present in developing countries whose first interest is not the client but the bottom line.
Its simply nice to think that in a small way I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I research the effects of community and environment on rates of crimes.

lender.name: Jonathan, Katie, Oliver & Samuel
lender.loan_because: what's not to like!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to raise world living standards. Micro finance is a great model, and Kiva is a great application.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working on a new type of micro finance platform. It integrates entrepreneurial tools with social networking and person to person financial relationships, to give greater opportunity to more people.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Jesus told me to be nice.
lender.occupational_info: I just sit there and push buttons all day while getting larger.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because:
Matthew 22: 34-40
Hearing that Jesus had silenced the Sadducees, the Pharisees got together. One of them, an expert in the law, tested him with this question: ‚ÄúTeacher, which is the greatest commandment in the Law?‚Äù Jesus replied: ‚Äú‚ÄòLove the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.‚Äô This is the first and greatest commandment. And the second is like it: ‚ÄòLove your neighbor as yourself.‚Äô All the Law and the Prophets hang on these two commandments.‚Äù

lender.name: Corliss
lender.loan_because: We~citizens of the world's community~must help each other. When one person improves life for her/his family, all of our lives are better.

lender.name: Kim Gaare
lender.loan_because: I beleive in this project. All loans should be without interest.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.occupational_info: I am a law student at the University of Wisconsin

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I get a lot of satisfaction from helping people in difficult situations help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I are retired and our work now is mainly on our house & property. We're happy to be able to help with micro loans to Kiva's many deserving clients -- you don't have to be wealthy to make a big difference in someone's life!

lender.loan_because: I know how important it is to support entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Noah & Katya

lender.name: Haley
lender.occupational_info: My work is my passion and is what makes me happy!

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: My husband and I are blessed with good jobs and a high standard of living. This allows us to fulfill our goal of helping others that are not as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Building and maintaining software to support excellent an customer experience for a telecommunications company.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a recent graduate of the University of Central Florida and work full-time at a local hotel!

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, even in this small way, to achieve their dreams and live the life they always wanted to live.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: I believe in people who have the belief and the will to change their own lives

lender.name: Daniel

lender.occupational_info: Manage everyday tasks.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because:
Because I can. Heard that before? Probably because that's why *lots* of us do this. By "world standards" I am a wealthy guy. I have a job, enough to eat, safe water to drink and a home that is safe and warm. And no one is blowing things up in my neighborhood.
More people deserve to live like this and maybe I can help that.
lender.occupational_info: I play jazz. I am a drummer (or percussionist, depending on who is paying me!) and I love to play bebop.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to help themselves. I've been down before, and was lucky to have friends, family, and business mentors willing to believe in me enough to help me get back on my feet.
lender.occupational_info: I charge business owners to show them how they can make their business more profitable by automating their business operations and leveraging existing customers and opportunities they might not see.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I like helping people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a marketing company that focuses on start-up companies. I help new businesses build their websites and spread the news about their company!

lender.name: Tate
lender.loan_because: I like that I can make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a teacher and I watch other peoples children to earn money.

lender.name: Mark & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We want pay it forward and make this a better place to live.

lender.name: Robert & Theresa
lender.loan_because: We are in love with the world & all it's foods, and cultures.
lender.occupational_info: A Chef, Musician, and a Diet Tech.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I believe low-interest microloans promote economic growth.

lender.occupational_info: I enjoy being retired and growing my own vegetables. Whenever I can I like to travel and enjoy the outdoors.

lender.occupational_info: Single mom of two daughters, who now have their own businesses. Foster mom to one boy.

lender.loan_because: I wanted to help. Part of what I have, belongs to others in need.

lender.loan_because: its the best thing to do with money

lender.loan_because: i want to help the needy and less fortunate

lender.loan_because: Serving others serves me.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I want to finance the set-up of a micro-industry to enable a poor woman to improve her living circumstances, with the view to becoming financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fully committed Rotarian, including being the Education Director of Operation Cleft Australia, which raises funds for the provision of much-needed cleft lip and / or cleft pallette surgery in Banladesh, with 4,000+ surgeries completed so far.

lender.occupational_info: I help ensure the correct medications are delivered to the correct patients in a safe, fast, and cost effective manner. I also provide information about drugs to patients and health care providers.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have access to credit and want to help pass along that access to entrepreneurs and to people who are trying to provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I lead alumni engagement for an 11,000 member network who are graduates of AmeriCorps (US domestic version of the Peace Corps) to keep them connected to each other and national service through events, conferences, and community service opportunities

lender.name: Matt Vasallo
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to better ones life is something most people take for granted.

lender.name: Marci
lender.loan_because: Over the past two years I received gifts from my brother and also invested money in KIVA to give back~ what an awesome way to reach out to others and help!

lender.name: JAIME
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Mobile Phone Industry

lender.name: McDonald Family
lender.loan_because: We think this is a great opportunity to help people who are working really hard to support themselves and their families. It is a terrific way to learn about life in other areas of the world.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are both water resources engineers. We help communities plan for their future water supply needs and help them maintain clean and safe water to drink. We have 3 children, ages 8, 10 and 12.

lender.loan_because: We loan because resources are not given to us to be hoarded, but shared. Also, it just plain feels good!
lender.occupational_info: We shoot personal and organizational photos & video. We especially enjoy working with non-profit humanitarian organizations.

lender.name: John Karin Ben & DD

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have so much to give

lender.name: Terrie
lender.loan_because: I am very thankful for all that I have and would like to assist others who are working to improve their lives. This is a great program and I am happy that I am able to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my time to community programs.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: i had a great two weeks in peru
lender.occupational_info: teach school when teachers are sick or at meetings.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great idea to help people help themselves. Lending money like this enables you to help a lot of people over time improve their individual circumstances through their own hard work and entrepreneurial spirit which is fantastic.
lender.occupational_info: I advise small business owners on risk, tax and accounting matters in Australia.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the butterfly effect, when applied to human agency. Giving even one dollar to one person across the world can have an impact on the lives of everyone around them, and around me. We claim to be a country of Christian values, but when it comes to some of the most simple values, charity and kindness, we all seem to fall apart. I want to prove that even the non-Christian among us can uphold these values and make the world better.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: "If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance." Abraham Lincoln
lender.occupational_info: I work at a free store for teachers. We help provide teachers in the Greater Cincinnati area with free school supplies for their students and schools.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: i believe that women can rebuild their communities .
lender.occupational_info: i have done many different things, sewed sails, worked on farms and worked as a donut maker.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because:
My Grandfather once said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs hard to pull yourself up by your bootstraps when you have no boots.‚Äù
My Grandmother always had a little garden in her back yard. During the Great Depression, to make extra money, people would stop to buy and pick their own vegetables. One day, as a little girl, my Mother remembers sitting on the back stoop with my Grandmother when a lady stopped to buy a ‚Äúdime‚Äôs worth‚Äù. My Grandmother handed her a paper sack and the lady set off to pick her vegetables. My Mother then asked, ‚ÄúHow do you know she won‚Äôt pick more than a dime‚Äôs worth?‚Äù My Grandmother simply replied, ‚ÄúShe knows how much she needs.‚Äù
I hope by being just one of the many loaning "boots", people everywhere will be able to pull themselves up by their bootstraps.

lender.name: Ruby
lender.loan_because: I feel it's a nice thing to do.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I like to go skiing, running, biking, and swimming. I really like to read and have 2 crabs

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the indigenous people, their cultures, and their challenges that I have met climbing and want to return something to support their dreams as they have supported mine.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who works to provide adequate water for irrigation and cities and towns in arid areas of the Western United States.

lender.loan_because: We can, and it's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Engineering and teaching Kindergarten

lender.loan_because: This is a win-win proposition.

lender.occupational_info: Retired from international business

lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance.

lender.loan_because: Its a small way to counter the huge inequality in our world
lender.occupational_info: We are raising a small family and doing our best to improve ourselves. Our life aim is to help others live satisfying lives

lender.name: Martin Sk√∂ld

lender.occupational_info: I develop electrical equipment used in mobile systems. It makes it possible for people all around the world to communicate using their mobile phones.

lender.loan_because: it's important to support self sufficiency in others

lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer and a civil servant, working for the European Union. I work in the area of competition law (sometimes known as antitrust), an area which tries to make markets work better by limiting anti-competitive behaviour by companies and - in the EU - governments.

lender.name: Viggo
lender.loan_because: Large scale development projects have shown to fail during decades. I believe microcredit may be a way to create development for people who need it most.

lender.name: Aprille
lender.loan_because: It allows me to help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Peter Hobbs
lender.loan_because: My sister-in-law gave me a kiva certificate for Christmas. I'm glad to have found out about this fantastic organisation

lender.occupational_info: I care for children and teach them the love of Yeshua (Jesus, Issa, Jesu)

lender.loan_because: Love to help people that have goals and are willing to work hard to realize their dreams.

lender.name: √Öshild
lender.loan_because: A small amount from me turns into a huge amount for somebody else. A good way to help somebody who needs it!

lender.loan_because: I believe in micro credit and the difference that a small amount loan can make.
lender.occupational_info: Retired and active

lender.name: Lena G.
lender.occupational_info: I help young disabled adults to get a good education and job.

lender.name: Henry Elohozino
lender.loan_because: I want to use to assist myself in Fish Farming so that I can get money out of it to sponsor my Education. I am an N.D holder of Mass Communication from Delta State Polytechnic, Ogwashi-Uku in Nigeria. I believe if I can get this Loan it will help in raising me from the craddle
lender.occupational_info: It is Fish Farming. I train the Fishes for aa period of 5-6 Months, feeding them all through and later harvest when they are matured. Treatment is also given to them within this period as well.

lender.name: Oskar
lender.loan_because: I don't believe in traditional charity. I have always thought the overhead was too big and the impact on the receivers lives too small. I would like to give people in developing countries the opportunity to improve their own situation.
lender.occupational_info: Working with R&D in a multinational company.

lender.name: Conny+Klaus
lender.occupation: mom and dad, secretary and warehouse manager

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in the power of small. I loan because I believe in the strength of many.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Indigenous Peoples Law and Policy Program at the University of Arizona, doing research, writing, case summaries, class materials, etc.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky, and have more than enough. I want to give back.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.occupational_info: Waste water treatment plants

lender.name: Anirban
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I study how people make decisions, and I try to teach my students what I know.

lender.name: Donna-Lynne
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a proven path to self‚Äìsufficiency. Unlike big banks, Kiva loans create wealth by providing small loans to people who have good ideas but no access to money. Since Kiva loans have good track record for repayment, my money gets recycled - creating opportunities to ever more people.
lender.occupational_info: I focus my volunteer efforts to help marginalized women because I believe that is the best way to effect social change. When women are economically empowered (i.e. have their own money), their children are more likely to be educated and healthy. As these children move out of poverty, they are able to improve the overall economic and social health of their communities.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I like having the opportunity to make a difference in the world by assisting individuals to support their families and make their world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I assist doctors with phone calls, paperwork, and typing patient visit notes.

lender.name: Hans-Petter
lender.loan_because: I want to share my fortune of being born in Norway.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: As an entrepeneur myself it has taken many years to make it and now I want to help others achieve what I have
lender.occupational_info: Advising on Internet Business

lender.name: Mattias
lender.loan_because: Starting small local businesses are better than material and food aid from US, UN and EU.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Engine Officer onboard one of Swedens largest vessels, Atlantic Compass. Our route is between Northern Europe and US East Coast.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending is an important tool for socioeconomic development.
lender.occupational_info:
I am CITO at Quick International Courier. I manage information Technology TeleCommunications and facilities for a mission-critical transportation company.
I am also the President of Alternative.
I am passionate about the art of healthy sustainable ecological peaceful living.

lender.loan_because: i have more than i need; other people have less than they need.
lender.occupational_info: teach people how to use software and read statistics

lender.name: Canadian Hot Tubs Inc
lender.loan_because: as an entrepreneurial company we can relate to the challenges facing these small business owners and understand the importance of others believing in you enough to give you a loan.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturer of authentic cedar hot tubs

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I work in missions and I am raising my children with an understanding of poverty. Kiva helps me teach them how they can be involved in helping people who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international Missions organization.

lender.name: Jochen
lender.loan_because: I love to help people

lender.name: Jaclyn
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help people out!

lender.occupational_info: I make educational training websites

lender.loan_because: I like to make connections to others

lender.name: Andreas H.
lender.occupational_info: I am investigating how pollution in big cities has changed in the past 15 years.

lender.name: Augusta
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy

lender.name: Kimberly Raiser
lender.loan_because: I can. The main reason I would ever want to be wealthy would be to help others!! My mother-in-law told me about this site, so for her birthday we made our first loan, and when that is repaid, we will reinvest it in someone else!!!
lender.occupational_info: I write fiction. Science Fiction, speculative fiction, and on occasion, silly fiction. My newest Sci-Fi thriller "The Family Bones" is now available!!!

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I didn't get much help starting my business, so I wanted to help someone else.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I know how much work it is to start and maintain a business. Keep working hard, always try, have hope and you will succeed!
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Event Entertainment

lender.name: Omni Job Boards
lender.loan_because: Our aim is to deliver the highest quality for best possible value. We see that Kiva strives to to reach the same goal and shares our desire to connect people to help reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: The Omni Job Board Network is a totally new concept in niche job board advertising. Our aim is to deliver the best selection of high quality candidates available, thereby offering the best possible value for your recruitment advertising dollar. A single job listed with Omni can be distributed across large number of affiliated job boards targeting job seekers in YOUR industry in YOUR location.

lender.name: Jesse Nmbr One
lender.occupational_info: Manager of a sign shop that produces mediocre products much to my own helpless disappointment.

lender.name: Carole
lender.occupational_info: Teacher & Potter

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of sustainable giving.
lender.occupational_info: I enter the medical information of people who are HIV positive into a database so they can more easily participate in research studies.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I don't want to sit back and wait for someone else to help. I can help, now, if only in small amounts!
lender.occupational_info: I buy television shows for a major kids' television network in the U.S. I get to watch tv shows from all around the world!

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do as a citizen of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer projects

lender.name: Mairi
lender.loan_because: No one can do everything, but everyone can do something.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit environmental organization which promotes the principles of zero waste.

lender.loan_because: To help poor people get things and make stuff.
lender.occupational_info: I just turned 5 yrs old and am going into kindergarten.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I care and I can. So, I must.
